answers.answer: You'll have to drink this stuff (it's like liquid sugar..) and you'll wait an hour and they'll test your blood. If you fail you'll do the same thing but they'll take your blood every hour for three hours answer if you fail that one you'll talk to a dietician about changing your diet. There's not really any risks with having it except most people with diabetes / gestational diabetes have big babies which means (if you do have a big baby) you'll most. Likely get induced a week early(:
